ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Completed")), OR( Hours_Remaining__c < 0, AND( NOT(LOE_Override__c), Task_Estimate_hrs__c - Hours__c < 0 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Hours Remaining cannot be less than zero. If Actual LOE exceeds Estimated LOE, then check "LOE Override" and manually enter the Remaining LOE.
